summary: Implemented requested Sub Category analytics on Dashboard (including new aggregation utilities), drill-down navigation to /tasks via subCategory/taskCategory search params with defensive validation, and inline comment editing in the Tasks table via a new InlineCommentEditor component and a comment-only mutation hook. Also includes additional unrelated utility/sorting changes not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified general URL parameter + sessionStorage helper utilities (not required for sub-category dashboard drilldowns or inline comment editing per the BuildRequest).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-67/68/69 do not request new URL/sessionStorage utilities; TanStack Router navigation + validateSearch were the specified mechanism.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended/added task sorting support including subCategory and other sort fields/labels (not explicitly requested as part of sub-category analytics or inline comment editing).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-67/68/69 do not mention adding new sorting capabilities; this appears to be extra functionality beyond the stated requirements.
